entry.title: WIND WARNING , Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Masset Municipal Airport 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 20.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSE 51 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
